</p>
</div>
</div></li>
<li class="gallerybox" style="width: 202px"><div style="width: 202px">
<div class="thumb" style="width: 200px;"><div style="margin:0px auto;"><a class="image" href="/wiki/File:Centre_Court,_28_March_2012.jpg" title="温布尔登的中央球场。该赛事初办于1877年，是世界上最古老的网球赛事[317]"><img alt="温布尔登的中央球场。该赛事初办于1877年，是世界上最古老的网球赛事[317]" data-file-height="1200" data-file-width="1600" decoding="async" height="150" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b0/Centre_Court%2C_28_March_2012.jpg/300px-Centre_Court%2C_28_March_2012.jpg" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b0/Centre_Court%2C_28_March_2012.jpg/451px-Centre_Court%2C_28_March_2012.jpg 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b0/Centre_Court%2C_28_March_2012.jpg/600px-Centre_Court%2C_28_March_2012.jpg 2x" width="200"/></a></div></div>

</p>
</div>
</div></li>

<h2><span id=".E5.8F.82.E8.A7.81"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="参见">参见</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E4%BC%A6%E6%95%A6&amp;action=edit&amp;section=50" title="编辑章节：参见">编辑</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/%E8%8B%B1%E5%9B%BD%E8%A1%8C%E6%94%BF%E5%8C%BA%E5%88%92" title="英国行政区划">英国行政区划</a></li>
<li><a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E4%BC%A6%E6%95%A6%E8%A1%8C%E6%94%BF%E5%8C%BA%E5%88%92" title="伦敦行政区划">伦敦行政区划</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%E5%80%AB%E6%95%A6%E7%B6%A0%E5%B8%B6%E5%9C%88" title="倫敦綠帶圈">倫敦綠帶圈</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%E5%80%AB%E6%95%A6%E8%AD%A6%E5%AF%9F%E5%BB%B3" title="倫敦警察廳">倫敦警察廳</a></li></ul>
<h2><span id=".E6.B3.A8.E9.87.8A"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="注释">注释</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E4%BC%A6%E6%95%A6&amp;action=edit&amp;section=51" title="编辑章节：注释">编辑</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<div class="reflist columns references-column-width" style="-moz-column-width: 30em; -webkit-column-width: 30em; column-width: 30em; list-style-type: decimal;">
<ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-11"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-11">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">伦敦市长与<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E4%BC%A6%E6%95%A6%E5%B8%82%E5%B8%82%E9%95%BF" title="伦敦市市长">伦敦市市长</a>非同一概念；后者为<a href="/wiki/%E5%80%AB%E6%95%A6%E5%B8%82%E6%B3%95%E5%9C%98" title="倫敦市法團">伦敦市法团</a>领导者，即伦敦城的管辖者。</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-22"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-22">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">由于对城市界限的定义、人口的规模、汇率的变化及产出的计算方式不同，城市都市区GDP的排名可能有一定的差别。伦敦和<a href="/wiki/%E5%B7%B4%E9%BB%8E" title="巴黎">巴黎</a>在总经济产出方面大致规模相近，由此第三方的不同估计对于第五和第六大城市GDP的排列可能不同。麦肯锡全球研究所2012年的报告估计伦敦全市2010年的GDP为US$7,518亿，巴黎则为$7,642亿，由此两市分别为第六和第五。普华永道2009年11月发布的报告称，根据购买力平价计算，2008年伦敦的GDP为US$5,650亿，巴黎则为US$5,640亿，分别为第五和第六。麦肯锡的研究中伦敦人口为1,490万，巴黎则为1,180万，而普华永道的研究中伦敦人口为859万，巴黎992万</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-40"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-40">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">根据<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E6%AC%A7%E6%B4%B2%E7%BB%9F%E8%AE%A1%E5%B1%80" title="欧洲统计局">欧洲统计局</a>数据，伦敦的大城市区（<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%B5%84%E5%90%88%E5%9F%8E%E5%B8%82" title="組合城市">组合城市</a>及高人口区域）为欧洲最大。基于城区行政界限内的<a href="/wiki/%E6%AC%A7%E7%9B%9F%E5%9F%8E%E5%B8%82%E4%BA%BA%E5%8F%A3%E5%88%97%E8%A1%A8" title="欧盟城市人口列表">人口排名</a>将伦敦排在第一位。然而法国阿维尼翁大学则称，当整个都市区及其内陆地区计算在内时，巴黎为最大城市。</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-105"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-105">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">大伦敦并非传统意义上的“城市”，即由君主授予其<a href="/wiki/%E8%8B%B1%E5%9C%8B%E5%9F%8E%E5%B8%82%E5%9C%B0%E4%BD%8D" title="英國城市地位">城市地位</a>。</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-119"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-119">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">根据《柯林斯英语词典》对“政府所在地”（the seat of government）的定义<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-london_061_116-0"><a href="#cite_note-london_061-116">[112]</a></sup>，由于英格兰没有自己的政府，因此伦敦不是英格兰的首都。根据《牛津英文参考词典》对“最重要城镇”（the most important town）的定义<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-london_062_117-0"><a href="#cite_note-london_062-117">[113]</a></sup>和其他机构的定义<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-london_063_118-0"><a href="#cite_note-london_063-118">[114]</a></sup>则是如此。</span>
</li>
</ol></div>
<h2><span id=".E5.8F.82.E8.80.83.E6.96.87.E7.8C.AE"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="参考文献">参考文献</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E4%BC%A6%E6%95%A6&amp;action=edit&amp;section=52" title="编辑章节：参考文献">编辑</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span id=".E5.BC.95.E7.94.A8"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="引用">引用</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E4%BC%A6%E6%95%A6&amp;action=edit&amp;section=53" title="编辑章节：引用">编辑</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<div class="reflist columns references-column-width" style="-moz-column-width: 30em; -webkit-column-width: 30em; column-width: 30em; list-style-type: decimal;">
<ol class="references">

<li id="cite_note-13"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-13">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20130922132807/http://moreintelligentlife.co.uk/content/ideas/john-parker/what-capital-world?page=full" rel="nofollow">What's The Capital Of The World?</a>. </li>
<li id="cite_note-14"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-14">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a class="external text" href="http://www.time.com/time/magazine/article/0,9171,1704398,00.html" rel="nofollow">A Tale Of Three Cities</a> （<a class="external text" href="//web.archive.org/web/20130826061224/http://www.time.com/time/magazine/article/0,9171,1704398,00.html" rel="nofollow">页面存档备份</a>，存于<a href="/wiki/%E4%BA%92%E8%81%94%E7%BD%91%E6%A1%A3%E6%A1%88%E9%A6%86" title="互联网档案馆">互联网档案馆</a>），《時代雜誌》， 2008年1月17日</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-15"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-15">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a class="external text" href="http://www.forbes.com/pictures/edgl45ghmd/no-1-london" rel="nofollow">The World's Most Influential Cities 2014</a>. <li id="cite_note-london_009-49"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-london_009_49-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation news">Ackroyd, Peter. <a class="external text" href="http://www.nytimes.com/2001/12/02/books/chapters/02-1st-ackro.html?ex=1225339200&amp;en=b9c2c11ad6e1f435&amp;ei=5070&amp;pagewanted=3" rel="nofollow">London</a>. </li>
<li id="cite_note-coates-50"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-coates_50-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation journal" id="CITEREFCoates1998">Coates, Richard. <a class="external text" href="https://www.webcitation.org/5yo0UqnAy?url=http://www.blackwell-synergy.com/doi/pdf/10.1111/1467-968X.00027" rel="nofollow">A new explanation of the name of London</a>. <li id="cite_note-66"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-66">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation journal"><a class="external text" href="http://www.bbc.co.uk/history/british/middle_ages/black_01.shtml" rel="nofollow">Black Death</a>. <li id="cite_note-104"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-104">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a class="external text" href="http://data.london.gov.uk/dataset/general-election-results-2015" rel="nofollow">General Election Results 2015</a>. <li id="cite_note-london_094-174"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-london_094_174-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation news" id="CITEREFPaton,_Graeme2007">Paton, Graeme. <a class="external text" href="http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/uknews/1564365/One-fifth-of-children-from-ethnic-minorities.html" rel="nofollow">One fifth of children from ethnic minorities</a>. <li id="cite_note-294"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-294">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20150826172424/http://www.richmond.gov.uk/home/services/leisure_and_culture/parks_and_open_spaces/park_details.htm?parkId=268" rel="nofollow">Richmond Borough Council</a>.  <span class="reference-accessdate"> [<span class="nowrap">2015-05-24</span>]</span>. （<a class="external text" href="http://www.richmond.gov.uk/home/services/leisure_and_culture/parks_and_open_spaces/park_details.htm?parkId=268" rel="nofollow">原始内容</a>存档于2015-08-26）.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E4%BC%A6%E6%95%A6&amp;rft.btitle=Richmond+Borough+Council&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.richmond.gov.uk%2Fhome%2Fservices%2Fleisure_and_culture%2Fparks_and_open_spaces%2Fpark_details.htm%3FparkId%3D268&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-295"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-295">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20080829192523/http://www.kew.org/ksheets/pdfs/k16kewhistory.pdf" rel="nofollow">Kew, History &amp; Heritage</a> <span style="font-size:85%;">(PDF)</span>. <a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=Royal_Botanic_Gardens,_Kew&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew（页面不存在）">Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew</a>.  <span class="reference-accessdate"> [<span class="nowrap">2013-01-24</span>]</span>. （<a class="external text" href="http://www.kew.org/ksheets/pdfs/k16kewhistory.pdf" rel="nofollow">原始内容</a> <span style="font-size:85%;">(PDF)</span>存档于2008-08-29）.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E4%BC%A6%E6%95%A6&amp;rft.btitle=Kew%2C+History+%26+Heritage&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.pub=Royal+Botanic+Gardens%2C+Kew&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.kew.org%2Fksheets%2Fpdfs%2Fk16kewhistory.pdf&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-296"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-296">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a class="external text" href="https://www.webcitation.org/5yo0xBire?url=http://www.cityoflondon.gov.uk/Corporation/LGNL_Services/Environment_and_planning/Parks_and_open_spaces/Hampstead_Heath/" rel="nofollow">City of London Corporation Hampstead Heath</a>. <li id="cite_note-london_181-314"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-london_181_314-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20080423182334/http://www.wimbledon.org/en_GB/index.html" rel="nofollow">Wimbledon — official website</a>. The All England Tennis and Croquet Club (AELTC).  <span class="reference-accessdate"> [<span class="nowrap">2008-04-29</span>]</span>. （<a class="external text" href="http://www.wimbledon.org/en_GB/index.html" rel="nofollow">原始内容</a>存档于2008-04-23）.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E4%BC%A6%E6%95%A6&amp;rft.btitle=Wimbledon+%E2%80%94+official+website&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.pub=The+All+England+Tennis+and+Croquet+Club+%28AELTC%29&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.wimbledon.org%2Fen_GB%2Findex.html&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-315"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-315">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation news">Clarey, Christopher. <a class="external text" href="http://www.nytimes.com/2008/07/05/sports/tennis/05wimbledon.html?ref=tennis" rel="nofollow">Traditional Final: It's Nadal and Federer</a>. </li>
<li id="cite_note-316"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-316">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation encyclopaedia">Will Kaufman &amp; Heidi Slettedahl Macpherson (编). <h3><span id=".E6.9D.A5.E6.BA.90"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="来源">来源</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E4%BC%A6%E6%95%A6&amp;action=edit&amp;section=54" title="编辑章节：来源">编辑</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<style data-mw-deduplicate="TemplateStyles:r61209943">.mw-parser-output .refbegin{font-size:90%;margin-bottom:0.5em}.mw-parser-output .refbegin-hanging-indents>ul{list-style-type:none;margin-left:0}.mw-parser-output .refbegin-hanging-indents>ul>li,.mw-parser-output .refbegin-hanging-indents>dl>dd{margin-left:0;padding-left:3.2em;text-indent:-3.2em;list-style:none}.mw-parser-output .refbegin-100{font-size:100%}</style><div class="refbegin" style="">
<dl><dt>书籍</dt></dl>
<ul><li><cite class="citation book" id="CITEREFAckroyd2001">Ackroyd, Peter. <a class="external text" href="https://archive.org/details/londonbiography0000ackr" rel="nofollow">London: The Biography</a>. London, England: Vintage. 2001: 880. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-0-09-942258-7" title="Special:网络书源/978-0-09-942258-7"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-0-09-942258-7</a>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E4%BC%A6%E6%95%A6&amp;rft.aufirst=Peter&amp;rft.aulast=Ackroyd&amp;rft.btitle=London%3A+The+Biography&amp;rft.date=2001&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=978-0-09-942258-7&amp;rft.pages=880&amp;rft.place=London%2C+England&amp;rft.pub=Vintage&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Farchive.org%2Fdetails%2Flondonbiography0000ackr&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></li>

Oxford Paperbacks. 2001. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-0-19-280106-7" title="Special:网络书源/978-0-19-280106-7"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-0-19-280106-7</a>. <a class="external text" href="//www.worldcat.org/oclc/45406491" rel="nofollow"><span title="OCLC">OCLC 45406491</span></a>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E4%BC%A6%E6%95%A6&amp;rft.aufirst=David&amp;rft.aulast=Mills&amp;rft.btitle=Dictionary+of+London+Place+Names&amp;rft.date=2001&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=978-0-19-280106-7&amp;rft.pub=Oxford+Paperbacks&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Farchive.org%2Fdetails%2Fdictionaryoflond0000mill&amp;rft_id=info%3Aoclcnum%2F45406491&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></li></ul>

<td><a href="https://zh.wikiversity.org/wiki/Special:Search/London" title="搜索维基学院"><img alt="搜索维基学院" data-file-height="900" data-file-width="1000" decoding="async" height="23" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1b/Wikiversity-logo-en.svg/25px-Wikiversity-logo-en.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1b/Wikiversity-logo-en.svg/38px-Wikiversity-logo-en.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1b/Wikiversity-logo-en.svg/50px-Wikiversity-logo-en.svg.png 2x" width="25"/></a>
</td>
<td>维基学院上的<a class="extiw" href="https://zh.wikiversity.org/wiki/Special:Search/London" title="v:Special:Search/London">學習资源</a>
</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
<ul><li><span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英語网页">（英文）</span><img alt="" class="noviewer" data-file-height="193" data-file-width="193" decoding="async" height="16" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/dd/Wikivoyage-Logo-v3-icon.svg/16px-Wikivoyage-Logo-v3-icon.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/dd/Wikivoyage-Logo-v3-icon.svg/24px-Wikivoyage-Logo-v3-icon.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/dd/Wikivoyage-Logo-v3-icon.svg/32px-Wikivoyage-Logo-v3-icon.svg.png 2x" width="16"/> <a href="/wiki/%E7%BB%B4%E5%9F%BA%E5%AF%BC%E6%B8%B8" title="维基导游">维基导游</a>上<a class="extiw" href="https://zh.wikivoyage.org/wiki/%E4%BC%A6%E6%95%A6#Q84" title="voy:伦敦">有關伦敦的旅行指南</a></li>
<li><span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英語网页">（英文）</span><a class="external text" href="http://www.london.gov.uk/" rel="nofollow">倫敦市政府</a>- 官方網站（（<a class="external text" href="//web.archive.org/web/20110225065020/http://www.london.gov.uk/" rel="nofollow">页面存档备份</a>，存于<a href="/wiki/%E4%BA%92%E8%81%94%E7%BD%91%E6%A1%A3%E6%A1%88%E9%A6%86" title="互联网档案馆">互联网档案馆</a>））</li>
<li><span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英語网页">（英文）</span><a class="external text" href="http://www.tfl.gov.uk/" rel="nofollow">倫敦交通</a>（TfL）- 城市的交通部門

</div></td><td style="border-left:2px solid #fdfdfd;padding:0px;text-align: left;;;;width:auto;"><div>

<li><b><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=1990%E5%B9%B4%E8%8B%B1%E8%81%94%E9%82%A6%E8%BF%90%E5%8A%A8%E4%BC%9A&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="1990年英联邦运动会（页面不存在）">1990</a>：</b><span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/%E6%96%B0%E8%A5%BF%E5%85%B0" title="新西兰"><img alt="新西兰" class="notpageimage thumbborder" data-file-height="600" data-file-width="1200" decoding="async" height="11" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/3e/Flag_of_New_Zealand.svg/22px-Flag_of_New_Zealand.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/3e/Flag_of_New_Zealand.svg/33px-Flag_of_New_Zealand.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/3e/Flag_of_New_Zealand.svg/44px-Flag_of_New_Zealand.svg.png 2x" width="22"/></a></span> <a href="/wiki/%E5%A5%A7%E5%85%8B%E8%98%AD" title="奧克蘭">奧克蘭</a></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/1994%E5%B9%B4%E8%8B%B1%E8%81%94%E9%82%A6%E8%BF%90%E5%8A%A8%E4%BC%9A" title="1994年英联邦运动会">1994</a>：</b><span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/%E5%8A%A0%E6%8B%BF%E5%A4%A7" title="加拿大"><img alt="加拿大" class="notpageimage thumbborder" data-file-height="600" data-file-width="1200" decoding="async" height="11" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/d9/Flag_of_Canada_%28Pantone%29.svg/22px-Flag_of_Canada_%28Pantone%29.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/d9/Flag_of_Canada_%28Pantone%29.svg/33px-Flag_of_Canada_%28Pantone%29.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/d9/Flag_of_Canada_%28Pantone%29.svg/44px-Flag_of_Canada_%28Pantone%29.svg.png 2x" width="22"/></a></span> <a href="/wiki/%E7%B6%AD%E5%A4%9A%E5%88%A9%E4%BA%9E_(%E4%B8%8D%E5%88%97%E9%A1%9B%E5%93%A5%E5%80%AB%E6%AF%94%E4%BA%9E)" title="維多利亞 (不列顛哥倫比亞)">维多利亚</a></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/1998%E5%B9%B4%E8%8B%B1%E8%81%94%E9%82%A6%E8%BF%90%E5%8A%A8%E4%BC%9A" title="1998年英联邦运动会">1998</a>：</b><span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/%E9%A9%AC%E6%9D%A5%E8%A5%BF%E4%BA%9A" title="马来西亚"><img alt="马来西亚" class="notpageimage thumbborder" data-file-height="600" data-file-width="1200" decoding="async" height="11" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/66/Flag_of_Malaysia.svg/22px-Flag_of_Malaysia.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/66/Flag_of_Malaysia.svg/33px-Flag_of_Malaysia.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/66/Flag_of_Malaysia.svg/44px-Flag_of_Malaysia.svg.png 2x" width="22"/></a></span> <a href="/wiki/%E5%90%89%E9%9A%86%E5%9D%A1" title="吉隆坡">吉隆坡</a></li></ul>
</div></td><td style="border-left:2px solid #fdfdfd;padding:0px;text-align: left;;;;width:auto;"><div>

<ul><li><b><a href="/wiki/1896%E5%B9%B4%E5%A4%8F%E5%AD%A3%E5%A5%A5%E6%9E%97%E5%8C%B9%E5%85%8B%E8%BF%90%E5%8A%A8%E4%BC%9A" title="1896年夏季奥林匹克运动会">1896</a>：</b><span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/%E5%B8%8C%E8%85%8A" title="希腊"><img alt="希腊" class="notpageimage thumbborder" data-file-height="800" data-file-width="1200" decoding="async" height="15" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/6e/Flag_of_Greece_%281822-1978%29.svg/22px-Flag_of_Greece_%281822-1978%29.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/6e/Flag_of_Greece_%281822-1978%29.svg/33px-Flag_of_Greece_%281822-1978%29.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/6e/Flag_of_Greece_%281822-1978%29.svg/44px-Flag_of_Greece_%281822-1978%29.svg.png 2x" width="22"/></a></span> <a href="/wiki/%E9%9B%85%E5%85%B8" title="雅典">雅典</a></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/1900%E5%B9%B4%E5%A4%8F%E5%AD%A3%E5%A5%A5%E6%9E%97%E5%8C%B9%E5%85%8B%E8%BF%90%E5%8A%A8%E4%BC%9A" title="1900年夏季奥林匹克运动会">1900</a>：</b><span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/%E6%B3%95%E5%9C%8B" title="法國"><img alt="法國" class="notpageimage thumbborder" data-file-height="600" data-file-width="900" decoding="async" height="15" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/bc/Flag_of_France_%281794%E2%80%931815%2C_1830%E2%80%931974%2C_2020%E2%80%93present%29.svg/22px-Flag_of_France_%281794%E2%80%931815%2C_1830%E2%80%931974%2C_2020%E2%80%93present%29.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/bc/Flag_of_France_%281794%E2%80%931815%2C_1830%E2%80%931974%2C_2020%E2%80%93present%29.svg/33px-Flag_of_France_%281794%E2%80%931815%2C_1830%E2%80%931974%2C_2020%E2%80%93present%29.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/bc/Flag_of_France_%281794%E2%80%931815%2C_1830%E2%80%931974%2C_2020%E2%80%93present%29.svg/44px-Flag_of_France_%281794%E2%80%931815%2C_1830%E2%80%931974%2C_2020%E2%80%93present%29.svg.png 2x" width="22"/></a></span> <a href="/wiki/%E5%B7%B4%E9%BB%8E" title="巴黎">巴黎</a></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/1904%E5%B9%B4%E5%A4%8F%E5%AD%A3%E5%A5%A5%E6%9E%97%E5%8C%B9%E5%85%8B%E8%BF%90%E5%8A%A8%E4%BC%9A" title="1904年夏季奥林匹克运动会">1904</a>：</b><span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/%E7%BE%8E%E5%9C%8B" title="美國"><img alt="美國" class="notpageimage thumbborder" data-file-height="650" data-file-width="1235" decoding="async" height="12" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/d5/Flag_of_the_United_States_%281896%E2%80%931908%29.svg/22px-Flag_of_the_United_States_%281896%E2%80%931908%29.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/d5/Flag_of_the_United_States_%281896%E2%80%931908%29.svg/33px-Flag_of_the_United_States_%281896%E2%80%931908%29.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/d5/Flag_of_the_United_States_%281896%E2%80%931908%29.svg/44px-Flag_of_the_United_States_%281896%E2%80%931908%29.svg.png 2x" width="22"/></a></span> <a href="/wiki/%E5%9C%A3%E8%B7%AF%E6%98%93%E6%96%AF_(%E5%AF%86%E8%8B%8F%E9%87%8C%E5%B7%9E)" title="圣路易斯 (密苏里州)">圣路易斯</a></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/1908%E5%B9%B4%E5%A4%8F%E5%AD%A3%E5%A5%A5%E6%9E%97%E5%8C%B9%E5%85%8B%E8%BF%90%E5%8A%A8%E4%BC%9A" title="1908年夏季奥林匹克运动会">1908</a>：</b><span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/%E8%8B%B1%E5%9B%BD" title="英国"><img alt="英国" class="notpageimage thumbborder" data-file-height="600" data-file-width="1200" decoding="async" height="11" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/ae/Flag_of_the_United_Kingdom.svg/22px-Flag_of_the_United_Kingdom.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/ae/Flag_of_the_United_Kingdom.svg/33px-Flag_of_the_United_Kingdom.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/ae/Flag_of_the_United_Kingdom.svg/44px-Flag_of_the_United_Kingdom.svg.png 2x" width="22"/></a></span> <a class="mw-selflink selflink">伦敦</a></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/1912%E5%B9%B4%E5%A4%8F%E5%AD%A3%E5%A5%A5%E6%9E%97%E5%8C%B9%E5%85%8B%E8%BF%90%E5%8A%A8%E4%BC%9A" title="1912年夏季奥林匹克运动会">1912</a>：</b><span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/%E7%91%9E%E5%85%B8" title="瑞典"><img alt="瑞典" class="notpageimage thumbborder" data-file-height="320" data-file-width="512" decoding="async" height="14" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/4/4c/Flag_of_Sweden.svg/22px-Flag_of_Sweden.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/4/4c/Flag_of_Sweden.svg/33px-Flag_of_Sweden.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/4/4c/Flag_of_Sweden.svg/44px-Flag_of_Sweden.svg.png 2x" width="22"/></a></span> <a href="/wiki/%E6%96%AF%E5%BE%B7%E5%93%A5%E5%B0%94%E6%91%A9" title="斯德哥尔摩">斯德哥尔摩</a></li>

</div></td><td style="border-left:2px solid #fdfdfd;padding:0px;text-align:l eft; padding-left: 0.2em; white-space: nowrap;;;;width:10em;"><div>

<ul><li><b><a href="/wiki/1968%E5%B9%B4%E5%A4%8F%E5%AD%A3%E5%A5%A5%E6%9E%97%E5%8C%B9%E5%85%8B%E8%BF%90%E5%8A%A8%E4%BC%9A" title="1968年夏季奥林匹克运动会">1968</a>：</b><span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/%E5%A2%A8%E8%A5%BF%E5%93%A5" title="墨西哥"><img alt="墨西哥" class="notpageimage thumbborder" data-file-height="560" data-file-width="980" decoding="async" height="13" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fc/Flag_of_Mexico.svg/22px-Flag_of_Mexico.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fc/Flag_of_Mexico.svg/33px-Flag_of_Mexico.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fc/Flag_of_Mexico.svg/44px-Flag_of_Mexico.svg.png 2x" width="22"/></a></span> <a href="/wiki/%E5%A2%A8%E8%A5%BF%E5%93%A5%E5%9F%8E" title="墨西哥城">墨西哥城</a></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/1972%E5%B9%B4%E5%A4%8F%E5%AD%A3%E5%A5%A5%E6%9E%97%E5%8C%B9%E5%85%8B%E8%BF%90%E5%8A%A8%E4%BC%9A" title="1972年夏季奥林匹克运动会">1972</a>：</b><span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/%E8%A5%BF%E5%BE%B7" title="西德"><img alt="西德" class="notpageimage thumbborder" data-file-height="600" data-file-width="1000" decoding="async" height="13" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/ba/Flag_of_Germany.svg/22px-Flag_of_Germany.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/ba/Flag_of_Germany.svg/33px-Flag_of_Germany.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/ba/Flag_of_Germany.svg/44px-Flag_of_Germany.svg.png 2x" width="22"/></a></span> <a href="/wiki/%E6%85%95%E5%B0%BC%E9%BB%91" title="慕尼黑">慕尼黑</a></li>

<li><i><b><a href="/wiki/2032%E5%B9%B4%E5%A4%8F%E5%AD%A3%E5%A5%A5%E6%9E%97%E5%8C%B9%E5%85%8B%E8%BF%90%E5%8A%A8%E4%BC%9A" title="2032年夏季奥林匹克运动会">2032</a>：</b><span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/%E6%BE%B3%E5%A4%A7%E5%88%A9%E4%BA%9A" title="澳大利亚"><img alt="澳大利亚" class="notpageimage thumbborder" data-file-height="640" data-file-width="1280" decoding="async" height="11" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b9/Flag_of_Australia.svg/22px-Flag_of_Australia.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b9/Flag_of_Australia.svg/33px-Flag_of_Australia.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b9/Flag_of_Australia.svg/44px-Flag_of_Australia.svg.png 2x" width="22"/></a></span> <a href="/wiki/%E5%B8%83%E9%87%8C%E6%96%AF%E7%8F%AD" title="布里斯班">布里斯班</a></i></li></ul>
</div></td></tr></tbody></table></div></td></tr><tr style="height:2px"><td colspan="3"></td></tr><tr><td class="navbox-abovebelow" colspan="2"><div><sup>（注1）</sup>因<a href="/wiki/%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%80%E6%AC%A1%E4%B8%96%E7%95%8C%E5%A4%A7%E6%88%98" title="第一次世界大战">第一次世界大战</a>取消；<sup>（注2）</sup>因<a href="/wiki/%E7%AC%AC%E4%BA%8C%E6%AC%A1%E4%B8%96%E7%95%8C%E5%A4%A7%E6%88%98" title="第二次世界大战">第二次世界大战</a>取消；<sup>（注3）</sup>受<a href="/wiki/2019%E5%86%A0%E7%8A%B6%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%E7%97%85%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85" title="2019冠状病毒病疫情">2019冠状病毒病疫情</a>影响推迟，但仍保留原定名称</div></td></tr></tbody></table></td></tr></tbody></table>
<table cellspacing="0" class="navbox" style="border-spacing:0"><tbody><tr><td style="padding:2px"><table cellspacing="0" class="nowraplinks collapsible collapsed navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th class="navbox-title" colspan="2" scope="col"><div class="plainlinks hlist navbar mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:%E6%AD%90%E6%B4%B2%E6%AD%8C%E5%94%B1%E5%A4%A7%E8%B3%BD" title="Template:歐洲歌唱大賽"><abbr style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;" title="查看该模板">查</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:%E6%AD%90%E6%B4%B2%E6%AD%8C%E5%94%B1%E5%A4%A7%E8%B3%BD" title="Template talk:歐洲歌唱大賽"><abbr style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;" title="讨论该模板">论</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://zh.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:%E6%AD%90%E6%B4%B2%E6%AD%8C%E5%94%B1%E5%A4%A7%E8%B3%BD&amp;action=edit"><abbr style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;" title="编辑该模板">编</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div style="font-size:110%"><a class="image" href="/wiki/File:Wiki_Eurovision_Heart_(Infobox).svg"><img alt="Wiki Eurovision Heart (Infobox).svg" data-file-height="250" data-file-width="238" decoding="async" height="16" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/e/ed/Wiki_Eurovision_Heart_%28Infobox%29.svg/15px-Wiki_Eurovision_Heart_%28Infobox%29.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/e/ed/Wiki_Eurovision_Heart_%28Infobox%29.svg/23px-Wiki_Eurovision_Heart_%28Infobox%29.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/e/ed/Wiki_Eurovision_Heart_%28Infobox%29.svg/30px-Wiki_Eurovision_Heart_%28Infobox%29.svg.png 2x" width="15"/></a> <a href="/wiki/%E6%AD%90%E6%B4%B2%E6%AD%8C%E5%94%B1%E5%A4%A7%E8%B3%BD" title="歐洲歌唱大賽">歐洲歌唱大賽</a></div></th></tr><tr style="height:2px"><td colspan="3"></td></tr><tr><td class="navbox-abovebelow hlist" colspan="2"><div>

<div style="padding-left:0.75em;">
<p><span class="nowrap">
<a href="/wiki/%E6%B3%95%E5%9B%BD" title="法国">法国</a> - <a href="/wiki/%E5%B7%B4%E9%BB%8E" title="巴黎">巴黎</a><br/>

<a href="/wiki/%E5%BE%B7%E5%9B%BD" title="德国">德国</a> - <a href="/wiki/%E6%9F%8F%E6%9E%97" title="柏林">柏林</a><br/>
<a href="/wiki/%E8%8D%B7%E5%85%B0%E7%8E%8B%E5%9B%BD" title="荷兰王国">荷蘭</a> - <a href="/wiki/%E9%98%BF%E5%A7%86%E6%96%AF%E7%89%B9%E4%B8%B9" title="阿姆斯特丹">阿姆斯特丹</a><br/>
<a href="/wiki/%E6%AF%94%E5%88%A9%E6%97%B6" title="比利时">比利时</a> - <a href="/wiki/%E5%B8%83%E9%B2%81%E5%A1%9E%E5%B0%94" title="布鲁塞尔">布鲁塞尔</a><br/>
<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%9B%A7%E6%A3%AE%E5%A0%A1" title="盧森堡">盧森堡</a> - <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%9B%A7%E6%A3%AE%E5%A0%A1_(%E5%9F%8E%E5%B8%82)" title="盧森堡 (城市)">盧森堡市</a><br/>
<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%88%B1%E5%B0%94%E5%85%B0%E5%85%B1%E5%92%8C%E5%9B%BD" title="爱尔兰共和国">愛爾蘭</a> - <a href="/wiki/%E9%83%BD%E6%9F%8F%E6%9E%97" title="都柏林">都柏林</a><br/>
<a href="/wiki/%E6%91%A9%E7%BA%B3%E5%93%A5" title="摩纳哥">摩纳哥</a><span style="font-size:smaller;">（城邦）</span><br/>

<a href="/wiki/%E8%8A%AC%E5%85%B0" title="芬兰">芬兰</a> - <a href="/wiki/%E8%B5%AB%E5%B0%94%E8%BE%9B%E5%9F%BA" title="赫尔辛基">赫尔辛基</a><br/>

href="/wiki/Category:%E6%9C%89%E8%93%9D%E9%93%BE%E5%8D%B4%E6%9C%AA%E7%A7%BB%E9%99%A4%E5%86%85%E9%83%A8%E9%93%BE%E6%8E%A5%E5%8A%A9%E6%89%8B%E6%A8%A1%E6%9D%BF%E7%9A%84%E9%A1%B5%E9%9D%A2"
